page.title: 08CEMETERY
page.content:
As you drive towards Scar on the B9068 on your left hand side you will see a wall with green gates.This is the {Burness graveyard.
It is 97 metres long by 55 metres wide.There are 320 grave stones in the yard.As we looked around there was a great variety of stones in different colours,sizes and shapes.
The{smallest grave}contains a triplet who died at five days old. The{stone was 20 centimetres high. The{biggest {stone}was 2.80 metres high.
The{oldest grave-stone}there was erected in 1828,the{newest}in 1983.
The{longest surviving person}died at the age of 89.
